title: When I Was Your Age
description:
Rapper Chet Hanx is in the news again when rumors of him being cut off by his very famous family arise. The guys compare where Tom Hanks was in his career at his son Chet's age.

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire
